Voting for UKIP will hand keys of No. 10 to Miliband, poll finds.

images.caption: Ed Miliband surrounded by Nigel Farage, Alex Salmond, Vince Cable with headlines suggesting negative outcomes of his potential leadership.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet appears to be an attack advertisement focusing on the potential negative consequences of Ed Miliband's leadership and hypothetical alliances with other parties.
